title: #Vanlife – Quigley 4×4 adds 2″ lift kit for 2WD, AWD Ford Transit
content:
Now there’s another option for lifting your Ford Transit camper van. Quigley, the brand most know as that 4×4 conversion kit company for Sprinters, Transits, and full size vans, has just launched their Q-Lift 2″ kit for Ford Transits. The kit drops the entire sub frame under the engine, which includes spacers, but also a

The post #Vanlife – Quigley 4×4 adds 2″ lift kit for 2WD, AWD Ford Transit appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
